wikipedia_page.main: Ann Hamilton (born 5 July 1939) is an English actress, best known for her numerous appearances with the comedians Morecambe & Wise.

link_mentions.page: List of The Avengers and The New Avengers cast members

response: Morecambe & Wise: Greatest Moments was a compilation programme originally aired on 2 December 2007 on the UKTV network channel UKTV Gold and featured clips, interviews and home move footage, culminating in the showing of the "best" sketch from their programmes.  It featured contributions from several of their guest stars such as Cliff Richard, Edward Woodward, Bruce Forsyth, Francis Matthews, Michele Dotrice and Elton John whom Eric always referred to as "Elephant John" as well as interviews with both Joan Morecambe and Doreen Wise, the latter's first appearance on a show of this kind.  There were also chats with writer Eddie Braben, co-star Ann Hamilton and fans Armstrong & Miller among others.  The show was narrated by Liza Tarbuck, daughter of comedian Jimmy Tarbuck and gave the following as the choice of "best" sketches from to duo:
*Ann Hamilton (American actress), American television actress known for her work in soap operas
*Ann Hamilton (British actress), British actress known for her appearances on the Morecambe & Wise Show
Ann Hamilton is an American actress.

Hamilton was the third actress to portray Melinda "Mindy" Lewis on the CBS daytime soap opera Guiding Light in 1993."Comings and Goings: Ann Hamilton (Corrine)." Soap Opera Digest, Vol. 33, No. 5, January 29, 2008, page 16-17. "Hamilton will recur as Rex's ... Aunt Corrine, starting on January 23. Hamilton played GL's Mindy in 1993 and last appeared as Corrine in 2002." She also played Rachel Blake on NBC's Days of Our Lives from 1995 to 1996, and in 2002 and 2008 appeared as Rex Balsom's much-talked-about aunt CorinneThough the character's name has been repeatedly spelled "Corrine" at ABC.com, SoapCentral.com and in Soap Opera Digest, Hamilton was credited as "Corinne" onscreen on January 25, 2008. on ABC's One Life to Live.
